titleStmt.title: Transusbstantiation examin'd and confuted in two sermons on the Lord's Supper / preach'd in the reign of Queen Elizabeth by H. Smith, sometime preacher at St. Clement Danes.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Wallis, and are to be sold by most booksellers,
